name: R2-medication-order-status-for-R4
title: Cross-version VS for R2.MedicationOrderStatus for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-order-status|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R2 to R4.
